description: The NC 211 site is an excellent source of information on many different topics. You may also speak with a Referral Specialist directly: call 866-401-6342 or dial 2-1-1 from your phone. The call is free, confidential, and available 24 hours a day.

The Department of Public Safety website provides a searchable database of active service providers by county in North Carolina. Information may be out of date â€“ always call first to confirm the agency address and stated restrictions.
The county-specific query page lets you create either short-form or detailed listings of the providers. The listings can be printed from a PDF document.
